name: Loquacious
0:
”Alexa, tell loquacious lines to me”
”Alexa, tell loquacious lines to flirt with me”
”Alexa, tell loquacious lines to cheer me up”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: loquacious lines
des: Should be especially useful around Valentine's Day. This Skill gets Alexa to respond loquaciously.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
